item.title: 塔吉克斯坦推出国家支持的信使应用程序
item.description: 塔吉克斯坦通信服务周二表示，该国已模仿俄罗斯和哈萨克斯坦的类似项目推出了一款全国性的信使应用程序，批评人士警告称，该应用程序可能会泄露用户数据。【原文：Tajikistan's communications service said on Tuesday that it had launched a national messenger app, mimicking similar projects in Russia and Kazakhstan, which critics have warned could compromise user data.】

item.title: 中国企业称欧盟商业环境已连续六年恶化
item.description: 周三公布的一项调查显示，在欧盟的中国企业表示，欧盟的经营状况已连续第六年恶化，劳动力成本上升和政治挑战给企业经营带来了压力。【原文：Chinese companies in the European Union say business conditions in the bloc have deteriorated for a sixth consecutive year, with rising labour costs and political challenges pressuring their operations, according to a survey published on Wednesday.】

item.title: 国际葡萄酒组织称，气候冲击抑制了全球葡萄酒产量
item.description: 国际葡萄与葡萄酒组织称，2025 年全球葡萄酒产量略有上升，但由于葡萄园面临极端和多变的天气，产量仍连续第三年低于平均水平。【原文：Global wine production rose slightly in 2025, but output remained below average for a third consecutive year as vineyards faced extreme and volatile weather, the International Organization of Vine and Wine said.】

item.title: 贸易解冻后，中国大豆供应过剩可能使美国出口希望落空
item.description: 在经历了数月创纪录的进口量之后，中国正在努力应对大豆供应过剩的问题，这抑制了美国的出口前景，尽管华盛顿最近达成了贸易休战协议，其中包括中国政府承诺恢复大量采购大豆。【原文：China is grappling with a glut of soybeans after months of record imports, curbing prospects for U.S. exports despite a recent trade truce that Washington said includes a pledge by Beijing to resume heavy purchases.】

item.title: 瑞银称未来五年数据中心将推动储能 "繁荣周期
item.description: 据瑞银证券（UBS Securities）称，美国由人工智能数据中心推动的电力需求增长可能会在未来五年推动储能技术的 "繁荣周期"，因为需要更多的储能技术来平滑风能和太阳能发电的波动。【原文：AI data centre-fuelled power demand growth in the U.S. is likely to drive a "boom cycle" for energy storage in the next five years as more storage is needed to smooth out fluctuations from wind and solar generation, according to UBS Securities.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司与谷歌达成俄亥俄州数据中心可再生能源协议
item.description: 法国石油巨头道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）周三表示，该公司已与 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司达成一项为期 15 年的购电协议，将从其位于俄亥俄州的蒙彼利埃（Montpelier）太阳能发电场供应 1.5 兆瓦时的可再生能源电力。【原文：Oil major TotalEnergies has agreed a 15-year power purchase deal to supply Alphabet's Google with 1.5 terawatt hours of renewable electricity from its Montpelier solar farm in Ohio, the French company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: PayPal 时隔近两年重新登陆英国
item.description: PayPal 周三表示，在英国脱欧后重组其在英国的业务近两年后，它将重新启动在英国的在线和门店购物业务。【原文：PayPal said on Wednesday it is re-launching in the United Kingdom for customers to shop online and in stores, nearly two years after it restructured its operations there following Brexit.】

item.title: 沃达康与马斯克的星链公司签订非洲互联网协议
item.description: 南非最大的移动运营商沃达康集团（Vodacom Group）周三表示，该电信公司已与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的星链公司（Starlink）签署协议，为非洲各地的企业提供高速、低延迟的宽带互联网。【原文：South Africa's largest mobile operator Vodacom Group has signed an agreement with Elon Musk's Starlink to deliver high-speed, low-latency broadband internet for businesses across Africa, the telecom firm said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 软银股价下滑，因出售英伟达股份凸显人工智能资金需求
item.description: 软银以 58 亿美元出售其在英伟达（Nvidia）的股份，凸显出软银为支持其对 ChatGPT 创造者 OpenAI 和其他投资的 "全押 "所面临的日益增长的资金需求，软银股价周三下滑达 10%。【原文：SoftBank's shares slid as much as 10% on Wednesday after the $5.8 billion sale of its stake in Nvidia highlighted the growing funding demands it faces to bankroll its "all-in" bet on ChatGPT creator OpenAI and other investments.】

item.title: 解释：多边开发银行为何面临改革压力？
item.description: 世界银行和其他多边开发银行（MDBs）正面临压力，要求它们向遭受能源挑战和气候灾害的贫困国家提供更多帮助。以下是您需要了解的信息：【原文：The World Bank and other multilateral development banks (MDBs) are under pressure to offer more help to poor countries being hammered by energy challenges and climate disasters. Here is what you need to know:】

item.title: 英飞凌上调人工智能电源部门 2026 年销售目标，以满足蓬勃发展的需求
item.description: 德国芯片制造商英飞凌（Infineon）周三以需求强劲为由，大幅上调了其 2026 年人工智能电源部门的销售目标。【原文：German chipmaker Infineon significantly raised its 2026 sales target for the AI power supply segment on Wednesday, citing strong demand, and forecast total revenue increasing moderately from the year before despite currency headwinds.】

item.title: 台湾电子公司富士康第三季度利润增长 17%，超出预期
item.description: 由于人工智能服务器需求持续强劲，全球最大的合约电子制造商台湾富士康周三公布第三季度利润增长 17%，超过市场预期。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn, the world's largest contract electronics maker, posted a 17% rise in third-quarter profit on Wednesday, beating market forecasts, on sustained strength in demand for artificial intelligence servers.】

item.title: 湾流公司称美国公务机需求强劲，但中国因贸易紧张局势而放缓
item.description: 美国贸易紧张局势减缓了中国公务机交易的机会，公务机制造商湾流宇航公司总裁说，这是全球私人飞机市场需求疲软的一个罕见案例。【原文：U.S. trade tensions have slowed opportunities for business jet deals in China, the president of corporate planemaker Gulfstream Aerospace said, in a rare case of demand softening in an otherwise upbeat global market for private aircraft.】

item.title: 因出售英国数据中心，RWE 九个月利润超出预期
item.description: 德国最大的电力生产商 RWE 公布的今年前九个月的利润高于预期，这主要得益于向一家大型云服务提供商出售数据中心项目所带来的 2.25 亿欧元（2.62 亿美元）的账面收益。【原文：RWE, Germany's largest power producer, reported higher-than-expected profits for the first nine months of the year, boosted by a 225 million euro ($262 million) book gain due to the sale of a data centre project to a large cloud service provider.】

item.title: 独家报道通用汽车希望零部件制造商从中国撤出供应链
item.description: 四位熟悉内情的人士称，通用汽车公司已指示其数千家供应商在供应链中清除来自中国的零部件，这反映出汽车制造商对地缘政治干扰其运营的日益不满。【原文：General Motors has directed several thousand of its suppliers to scrub their supply chains of parts from China, four people familiar with the matter said, reflecting automakers’ growing frustration over geopolitical disruptions to their operations.】

item.title: 聚焦：M&S 调整时装供应链，促进在线业务增长
item.description: 玛莎百货（Marks & Spencer）的新任时尚老板告诉路透社，该公司正在对其供应链进行从 "工厂到地面 "的改革，因为它希望将非食品类的年在线销售额翻一番，达到近 30 亿英镑（40 亿美元）。【原文：Marks & Spencer is revamping its supply chain from "factory to floor", the retailer's new fashion boss told Reuters, as it looks to double annual online non-food sales to nearly 3 billion pounds ($4 billion).】

item.title: 人工智能涨势停滞，亚洲股市 11 月外资流出逾 100 亿美元
item.description: 11 月第一周，亚洲股市出现了严重的跨境资金外流，原因是投资者对高昂的科技估值持谨慎态度，而且对市场长期反弹的可持续性感到不确定，因此纷纷获利了结。【原文：Asian equities witnessed steep cross-border outflows in the first week of November as investors booked profits on caution over lofty tech valuations and uncertainty about the sustainability of an extended market rally.】

item.title: 早间竞标美国国会准备恢复工作
item.description: 格雷戈尔-斯图尔特-亨特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Gregor Stuart Hunter】

item.title: 国际能源署称，世界石油和天然气需求将增长至 2050 年
item.description: 国际能源机构（International Energy Agency）周三表示，全球对石油和天然气的需求在2050年之前都可能增长，这与该机构以前对迅速过渡到清洁燃料的预期不同，并预测全球很可能无法实现气候目标。【原文：Global oil and gas demand could grow until 2050, the International Energy Agency said on Wednesday, departing from its previous expectations of a speedy transition to cleaner fuels and predicting that the world will likely fail to achieve climate goals.】

item.title: 旅行减少，钱包紧缩：报告显示，假日旅游需求全面降温
item.description: 德勤（Deloitte）周三发布的一份报告显示，由于对财务状况的担忧日益加剧，美国人计划减少出游次数和花费，因此今年的假期高峰可能会失去一些动力，甚至在高收入游客中也是如此。【原文：The holiday rush may lose some of its momentum this year — even among high-income travelers — as a report from Deloitte on Wednesday shows Americans are planning to take fewer trips and spend less on them amid growing financial concerns.】

item.title: 土耳其电信与谷歌签署云技术合作协议
item.description: 土耳其电信运营商 Turkcell 在一份公告中称，该公司于周三与谷歌签署了一项云技术战略合作协议。【原文：Turkish telecoms operator Turkcell signed an agreement with Google on Wednesday for strategic cooperation on cloud technologies, the company said in a notice.】

item.title: 中国 "光棍节 "购物节落下帷幕，消费者情绪 "低迷"，销售预期不佳
item.description: 在中国最大的电子商务平台上开展了一个多月的促销活动后，中国的 "光棍节 "销售节即将落下帷幕。【原文：China's Singles' Day sales festival is coming to a close after more than a month of promotions on the country's largest e-commerce platforms, which failed to spark widespread consumer excitement during the world's largest shopping event.】

item.title: 独家报道：副行长：澳大利亚央行就货币政策是否具有限制性展开辩论
item.description: 澳大利亚央行的一位高层人士周三表示，关于当前3.6%的现金利率是否足以限制通胀的争论越来越多，并补充说这个问题对政策前景至关重要。【原文：A top Australian central banker said on Wednesday that there was increasing debate about whether the current cash rate of 3.6% is restrictive enough to keep inflation in check, adding that the question is critical for the policy outlook.】

item.title: 大型科技公司停止抱怨，开始遵守澳大利亚青少年社交媒体禁令
item.description: 12 月 10 日，世界上首次开始禁止儿童使用社交媒体，届时，网络平台将通过 100 多万个账户向澳大利亚青少年发送信息，让他们做出选择：下载数据、冻结个人资料或丢失所有资料。【原文：Online platforms will ping Australian teenagers through over a million accounts in coming days offering a choice: download data, freeze profiles or lose the lot when a world-first ban on kids using social media starts on December 10.】

item.title: 越南副总理称越南有望很快与美国签署贸易协议
item.description: 越南副总理裴青山（Bui Thanh Son）周三表示，随着新一轮谈判在华盛顿特区展开，越南有望很快与美国签署 "互惠贸易协定"。【原文：Vietnam expects to sign a "reciprocal trade agreement" with the United States soon, Deputy Prime Minister Bui Thanh Son said on Wednesday, as a new round of negotiations gets underway in Washington DC.】

item.title: 日元稳定币发行商预测在日本债券市场的地位将日益提高
item.description: 日本国内首家与日元挂钩的稳定币发行商负责人告诉路透社，稳定币发行商可能在几年内成为日本政府债券的主要买家，并影响央行对货币政策的控制。【原文：Stablecoin issuers could become major buyers of Japanese government bonds in several years and influence the central bank's control over monetary policy, the head of Japan's first domestic issuer of yen-pegged stablecoins told Reuters.】

item.title: 澳大利亚间谍头目称中国黑客正在探测电信和关键基础设施
item.description: 澳大利亚间谍头目称，为中国政府和军方工作的黑客已经探查了澳大利亚的电信网络和关键基础设施，并在周三警告称，如果实施破坏性攻击，可能会对经济造成破坏。【原文：Australia's spy chief said hackers working for the Chinese government and military had probed Australia's telecommunications network and critical infrastructure, warning on Wednesday of the potential for disruption to the economy if a sabotage attack were carried out.】

item.title: 市场关注美国政府重开，油价变化不大
item.description: 周三，油价在前一交易日上涨后变化不大，因为市场预期美国政府结束有史以来最长的停摆可能会提振世界最大原油消费国的需求。【原文：Oil prices were little changed on Wednesday after rising in the previous session amid expectations that an end to the longest-ever U.S. government shutdown could boost demand in the world's biggest crude consuming nation.】

item.title: 监管机构称，爱尔兰企业税收可避免关税打击，但风险上升
item.description: 爱尔兰财政监督机构表示，迄今为止，爱尔兰大多数企业纳税大户都没有受到美国关税的直接影响，但美国的贸易政策使这一重要的政府收入来源的前景变得越来越不确定。【原文：Most of Ireland's big corporate taxpayers have so far escaped the direct impact of U.S. tariffs, but American trade policies have made the outlook for this critical source of government revenue increasingly uncertain, Ireland's fiscal watchdog said.】

item.title: 美国就业市场疲软，交易员关注美联储 12 月减息，美元走软
item.description: 周三，美国私营部门的就业数据激起了投资者对劳动力市场健康状况的担忧，美元汇率有所回落，投资者还在为即将到来的美国政府重开做准备，预计重开后将发布一系列积压的经济数据。【原文：The dollar eased on Wednesday after private-sector U.S. jobs data stoked worries about the health of the labour market, with investors also bracing for an imminent U.S. government reopening that is expected to unleash a backlog of economic releases.】
